org.mt4j.components
Class MTLight

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.components.MTLight

public class MTLight
extends java.lang.Object

The Class MTLight. Abstracts the opengl lightning.

Author:
Christopher Ruff

Method Detail

enableLightningAndAmbient

public static void enableLightningAndAmbient(processing.core.PApplet pa,
                                             float ambientR,
                                             float ambientG,
                                             float anbientB,
                                             float ambientA)
Enable lightning and ambient. Should be called before doing anything with light!

- Enables gl lightning
- sets an ambient light
- enables color material
- enables RESCALE_NORMAL

Parameters:
pa - the pa
ambientR - the ambient r
ambientG - the ambient g
anbientB - the anbient b
ambientA - the ambient a
